title: OS Level 2 â€” Process Concepts & States
intro: This level focuses on process concepts, process states, and the Process Control Block (PCB).
points: Understand what a process is (program in execution).
Know the difference between program, process and thread (basic idea).
Learn common process states: New, Ready, Running, Waiting/Blocked, Terminated.
Understand the role of Process Control Block (PCB) and what it stores.
Basics of context switching between processes.
